publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1324.2 Nicola Sturgeon: NHS Governance and Accountability-As an amendment to motion (S1M-1324) in the name of Susan Deacon, insert at end "and further notes that the formulation and implementation of such proposals for change must fully involve both staff and the public and that such changes must be adequately resourced if they are to be successful." Supported by: Shona Robison*
